name: melascrivi-plugin
author: AdIntend

sections.description:
This plugin include in the WordPress Dashboard all the services of Melascrivi.com and Hotype.co.uk. Every WP blog owner will be able to ask, review, accept and then publish unique contents on his website. Simple and strongly recommended for SEO needs.

A note by the author
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload melascrivi_plugin.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Sign up or register to request new orders
sections.faq:
Does this plugin cost money?

No, this software is for free.

Is this the official WordPress plugin by Melascrivi/Hotype?

Yes, this is the official WordPress plugin by Melascrivi/Hotype.
